Text: <c.white><c.mono_sans>Would you not like to be married</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>and it made me wonder what I had</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>I want to grow and to prosper,</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>Then you are no longer a child.</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>I can think of no one who I</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>He is neither willing nor is his</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>for the sake of all of you,</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>I trust that the gods will find</c.mono_sans></c.white>
